outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of the self-assessment is to undertake a highly consultative and participatory process of needs assessment to identify and validate the priorities for the Second National Communication in Syria. The self-assessment will assist the national team responsible for the preparation of the SNC project proposal to conduct a systematic analysis of work carried out in the previous NCs. Through this self-assessment national teams will identify and validate priorities for further in-depth studies during the preparation of its SNC

Through this self-assessment national teams will identify and validate priorities for further in-depth studies during the preparation of its SNC

project_descr: Syria self-assessment for preparation of SNC to UNFCCC
project_title: SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNICATION TO THE UNFCC
